name: Hyperstellar Fusion
description:
In the distant future, long after earth’s resources are depleted, the human race left for the stars aboard self-sustained ships destined for new worlds.

Each ship set off in a different direction and were accompanied by a small fleet called the Solar Vanguard. The purpose of the Vanguard is two fold, protect the mother ship and explore deeper into space for planets for the inhabitants of the mother ship to colonise.
